statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

article.headline: Fairleigh Dickinson 78, St. Francis, Pa. 75
article.story: HACKENSACK, N.J. -- Mike Scott scored 20 points and dished out nine assists to lead Fairleigh Dickinson to a 78-75 victory over St. Francis (Pa.) on Saturday night. Sean Baptiste added 19 points for the Knights (5-15, 4-4 Northeast Conference), who snapped a three-game losing streak with the win. Fairleigh Dickinson held a 76-73 lead after Scott made a pair of free throws with 21 seconds left. St. Francis' Will Felder responded with a short jumper that cut the Knights' lead to one, and Scott was fouled again immediately. With 6 seconds remaining, Scott nailed both free throws, making the score 78-75. St. Francis had one last chance to tie the score, but Sorena Orandi's 3-point shot was released after the final buzzer sounded, giving Fairleigh Dickinson the three-point victory. Devin Sweetney scored 19 points to lead the Red Flash (5-14, 3-5), who are now 0-10 on the road. Felder added 17 points.
